title.value: V2 Table: Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme

description.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0356 (Alternate Character Set Handling Scheme)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

display.value: This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .

definition.value: This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .

display.value: The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2, "Escape sequences supporting multiple character sets" and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".

definition.value: The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2, "Escape sequences supporting multiple character sets" and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".

display.value: This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.

definition.value: This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.
